channel.title: [508] Monster drop problem. What am I doing wrong?
channel.description:
Hello
I'm using Rubik's Source and I wanted to add drops to all GWD monsters. SO, I added some drops to the npcdrop.cfg but I only get either big bones (likely) or the GS as a drop but I DO have other items on the line. Here's what I've added to the list:
[code]6260=11696,1-1,25:100;532,1-1,90:100;100;995,50000-100000,80:100;6585,1-1,60:100;11732,1-1,50:100;2434,1-1,80:100;6737,1-1,40:100;7462,1-1,60:100;11724,1-1,40:100;11726,1-1,40:100;;11728,1-1,50:100; 6222=11694,1-1,25:100;536,1-1,90:100;100;995,500000-100000,80:100;6585,1-1,50:100;11732,1-1,50:100;2434,1-1,60:100;6737,1-1,40:100;7462,1-1,60:100;11718,1-1,50:100;11720,1-1,40:100;11722,1-1,40:100; 6247=11698,1-1,25:100;534,1-1,90:100;100;995,50000-100000,80:100;6585,1-1,60:100;11732,1-1,50:100;2434,1-1,30:100;6737,1-1,40:100;7462,1-1,60:100;11730,1-1,40:100;11732,1-1,70:100; 6203=11700,1-1,25:100;528,1-1,90:100;100;995,500000-1000000,80:100;6585,1-1,40:100;11732,1-1,50:100;2434,1-1,500:100;6737,1-1,40:100;7462,1-1,60:100;11717,1-1,40:100;
[/code]
And there appears to be some errors on the server's run. [code]Starting server on port: 43594 Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1 java.net.SocketException: Socket closed at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(Unknown Source) at palidino76.rs2.net.PlayerSocket.write(PlayerSocket.java:113) at palidino76.rs2.io.Login.directFlushStream(Login.java:350) at palidino76.rs2.io.Login.updateServer(Login.java:273) at palidino76.rs2.io.Login.login(Login.java:57) at palidino76.rs2.Engine.connectAwaitingPlayers(Engine.java:266) at palidino76.rs2.Engine.run(Engine.java:155) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1 Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1 [iceman] Unhandled packet: 129 Exception dropping item: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 [iceman] Unhandled item selected: 149:532:3 Exception dropping item: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 Exception dropping item: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 Exception dropping item: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 [/code]
So... what am I doing wrong?
Thank you Iceman

item.title: [508] Monster drop problem. What am I doing wrong?
item.dc:creator: @icemansnowman icemansnowman
item.description:
@icemansnowman wrote:

pfft I already changed to Butterscape source and the thing is it doesn’t even have a npcdrops.cfg but the monsters drop and in an ironic way… they drop exactly what I wanted the other source to drop in the first place

Read full topic

@King_Lingerz wrote:

item.title: [508] Monster drop problem. What am I doing wrong?
item.dc:creator: @icemansnowman icemansnowman
item.description:
@icemansnowman wrote:

Hello

I’m using Rubik’s Source and I wanted to add drops to all GWD monsters. SO, I added some drops to the npcdrop.cfg but I only get either big bones (likely) or the GS as a drop but I DO have other items on the line. Here’s what I’ve added to the list:

[code]6260=11696,1-1,25:100;532,1-1,90:100;100;995,50000-100000,80:100;6585,1-1,60:100;11732,1-1,50:100;2434,1-1,80:100;6737,1-1,40:100;7462,1-1,60:100;11724,1-1,40:100;11726,1-1,40:100;;11728,1-1,50:100;
6222=11694,1-1,25:100;536,1-1,90:100;100;995,500000-100000,80:100;6585,1-1,50:100;11732,1-1,50:100;2434,1-1,60:100;6737,1-1,40:100;7462,1-1,60:100;11718,1-1,50:100;11720,1-1,40:100;11722,1-1,40:100;
6247=11698,1-1,25:100;534,1-1,90:100;100;995,50000-100000,80:100;6585,1-1,60:100;11732,1-1,50:100;2434,1-1,30:100;6737,1-1,40:100;7462,1-1,60:100;11730,1-1,40:100;11732,1-1,70:100;
6203=11700,1-1,25:100;528,1-1,90:100;100;995,500000-1000000,80:100;6585,1-1,40:100;11732,1-1,50:100;2434,1-1,500:100;6737,1-1,40:100;7462,1-1,60:100;11717,1-1,40:100;

[/code]

And there appears to be some errors on the server’s run.

Starting server on port: 43594 Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1 java.net.SocketException: Socket closed at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(Unknown Source) at palidino76.rs2.net.PlayerSocket.write(PlayerSocket.java:113) at palidino76.rs2.io.Login.directFlushStream(Login.java:350) at palidino76.rs2.io.Login.updateServer(Login.java:273) at palidino76.rs2.io.Login.login(Login.java:57) at palidino76.rs2.Engine.connectAwaitingPlayers(Engine.java:266) at palidino76.rs2.Engine.run(Engine.java:155) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1 Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1 [iceman] Unhandled packet: 129 Exception dropping item: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 [iceman] Unhandled item selected: 149:532:3 Exception dropping item: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 Exception dropping item: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 Exception dropping item: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1

So… what am I doing wrong?

Thank you
Iceman
